doc.title: Highlight: size property

value.content: The size property returns the number of Range objects in a Highlight object.

value.title: Value
value.content: The value of size is a read-only integer representing how many entries the highlight object has.

value.title: Using size
value.content:
js

const highlight = new Highlight();
highlight.add(range1);
highlight.add(range2);
highlight.add(range3);

console.log(highlight.size); // 3

value.title: See also
value.content:
• The CSS Custom Highlight API
  • CSS Custom Highlight API: The Future of Highlighting Text Ranges on the Web
